title: Dead Rising 2: Complete Pack (All DLCs, MULTI7) [FitGirl Repack
description:
::Information::

Release Date: September 24, 2010 / October 11, 2011
Genres/Tags: Action, Third-person, 3D, Zombies
Developer: Blue Castle Games
Publisher: Capcom
Platform: PC [Repack]
Engine: in-house
Steam User Rating: 71% of user reviews are positive (based on 1490 reviews)

Interface Language: English, French, Italian, Spanish, Japanese, Korean, Russian
Audio Language: English
Crack: built-in (PROPHET/RELOADED)


::Repack Features::

Based on two ISO releases by PROPHET: ppt-dr2z.iso (5,650,388,992 bytes) & ppt-2otr.iso (5,584,048,128 bytes)
Both these versions have G4WL removed & proper save/load functions
All DLCs for both versions included
Official Russian localization added from earlier (non-Steam) release
MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
Ability to skip downloading and installing useless multiplayer videos - download them only if you need the full game in your archive no matter what
Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 10.5 to 5.3/5.8 GB)
Installation takes 12-25 minutes (depending on number of CPU cores)
After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
HDD space after installation: 14 GB
Repack by FitGirl


Repack includes:

Dead Rising 2 (Original Game)
Dead Rising 2 - Ninja Skills Pack DLC
Dead Rising 2 - Psychopath Skills Pack DLC
Dead Rising 2 - Soldier of Fortune Pack DLC
Dead Rising 2 - Sports Fan Skills Pack DLC
Dead Rising 2: Off the Record (Original Game)
Dead Rising 2: Off the Record - BBQ Chef Skills Pack DLC
Dead Rising 2: Off the Record - COSPLAY Skills Pack DLC
Dead Rising 2: Off the Record - Firefighter Skills Pack DLC
Dead Rising 2: Off the Record - Cyborg Skills Pack DLC
